tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Leadership_Succession_Planning (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  current_position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  potential_successor VARCHAR(50),
  years_in_current_position INT
);

CREATE TABLE Leadership_Succession_Planning (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  successor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Successor_Eligibility (
  successor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  years_experience INT,
  readiness_score FLOAT,
  eligibility_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE SuccessorProfile (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    successor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    experience_years INT,
    skills VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE SuccessionHistory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    previous_role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    new_role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transition_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SuccessionPlan (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    position_id UUID NOT NULL,
    successor_id UUID NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Leadership_Team (
     id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     name VARCHAR(255),
     position VARCHAR(255),
     start_date DATE,
     end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Successors (
     successor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     team_id INT,
     name VARCHAR(255),
     position VARCHAR(255),
     start_date DATE,
     end_date DATE,
     FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Leadership_Team(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Succession_Plans (
     plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     team_id INT,
     successor_id INT,
     start_date DATE,
     end_date DATE,
     FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Leadership_Team(id),
     FOREIGN KEY (successor_id) REFERENCES Successors(successor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Training_Programs (
     program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     program_name VARCHAR(255),
     description TEXT,
     start_date DATE,
     end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Performance_Reviews (
     review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
     successor_id INT,
     rating INT,
     comments TEXT,
     FOREIGN KEY (successor_id) REFERENCES Successors(successor_id)
);
